			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"health_bonus_perstack"		"100 200 400 800 1600 3200 4800"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"str_bonus_perstack"		"10 15 20 25 50 100 150"
			"LinkedSpecialBonus"		"special_bonus_unique_pudge_1"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"		"8 11 14 17 20 27 35"
		}
	}
		
		
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven"  //This modifier is always on Pudge and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
			{
				"Passive"   "1"
				"IsHidden"  "1"
				
				"OnAttackLanded"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
							  "ScriptFile" "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
							  "Function" "pudgeHP_shiftOnAttack"
							  "StatLoss"	"%health_bonus_perstack"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_buff_counter"  //A visible counter that will appear in Pudge's modifier bar.
			{
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_debuff_counter"  //A visible counter that will appear in Pudge's target's modifier bar.
			{
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_buff"
			{
				"Duration"				"%duration"
				"Passive"				"0"
				"IsHidden"  			"1"
				"Attributes"			"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS" "%str_bonus_perstack"
				}
				
				"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
							  "ScriptFile" "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
							  "Function" "pudgeHP_shiftBuffOnDestroy"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_debuff"
			{
				"Duration"				"%duration"
				"Passive"				"0"
				"IsHidden"  			"1"
				"Attributes"			"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MIN_HEALTH" "-%health_bonus_perstack"
				}
				"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
							  "ScriptFile" "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
							  "Function" "pudgeHP_shiftDebuffOnDestroy"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"IsPurgable"	"0"
				
				"EffectName"	"particles/customgames/capturepoints/cp_fire_psfread.vpcf"
				"EffecAttachType"	"follow_overhead"
				
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_NEGATIVE_EVASION_CONSTANT" "%internal_cooldown"
				}
			}
		}

	// Rewrite of the Doom Doom ability
	// Author: Pizzalol
	// Date: 25.02.2015.
	"doom_bringer_doom_ebf"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"ID"							"5342"														// unique ID number for this ability.  Do not change this once established or it will invalidate collected stats.
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_ALL"
		"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
		"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"2"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"			"7"
		"MaxLevel"						"7"
		
		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.5"

		// Time		
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastRange"				"550 550 550"
		"AbilityCooldown"				"200.0"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"150 200 250"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"duration"				"15.0"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage"				"200 400 800 1600 3200 6400 12800"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"duration_scepter"		"16.0 16.0 16.0"
			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage_scepter"		"400 800 1600 3200 6400 12800 25000"
			}
			"05"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"deniable_pct"			"25 25 25"
			}
		}

	    "OnSpellStart"
	    {
	        "FireSound"
	        {
	            "EffectName"    "Hero_DoomBringer.Doom"
	            "Target"
	            {
	                "Center"    "TARGET"
	                "Flags"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
	            }
	        }

	        "RunScript"
	        {
	            "ScriptFile"    "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
	            "Function"      "DoomPurge"
	        }

	        "ApplyModifier"
	        {
	            "ModifierName"  "modifier_doom_datadriven"
	            "Target" 
	            {
	                "Center"    "TARGET"
	                "Flags"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
	            }
	            "Duration"      "%duration"
	        }

	        "ApplyModifier"
	        {
	            "ModifierName"  "modifier_doom_deny_check_datadriven"
	            "Target" 
	            {
	                "Center"    "TARGET"
	                "Flags"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
	            }
	            "Duration"      "%duration"
	        }
	    }

	    "Modifiers"
	    {
	        "modifier_doom_datadriven"
	        {
	            "IsDebuff"          "1"
	            "IsPurgable"        "0"
	    
	            "StatusEffectName"      "particles/status_fx/status_effect_doom.vpcf"      
	            "StatusEffectPriority"  "10"
	    
	            "OnCreated"
	            {
	                "AttachEffect"
	                {
	                    "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_doom_bringer/doom_bringer_doom.vpcf"
	                    "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
	                    "Target"
	                    {
	                        "Center"    "TARGET"
	                        "Flags"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
	                    }

	                    "ControlPoints"
	                    {
	                        "04"    "TARGET"
	                    }
	                }
	            }

	            "OnDestroy"
	            {
	                "RunScript"
	                {
	                    "ScriptFile"    "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
	                    "Function"      "StopSound"
	                    "sound"         "Hero_DoomBringer.Doom"
	                }
	            }

	            "ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
	            "OnIntervalThink"
	            {
	                "Damage"
	                {
	                    "Target"        "TARGET"
	                    "Type"          "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
	                    "Damage"        "%damage"
	                }
	            }

	            "States"
	            {
	                "MODIFIER_STATE_SILENCED"       "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

	"life_stealer_devour"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AUTOCAST | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ATTACK"
		"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
		"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"custom/life_stealer_devour"
		"MaxLevel"						"7"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"			"7"

		// Time		
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastRange"				"150"

		// Damage.
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityDamage"					"75 150 300 600 1250 2500 5000"
		"AbilityDuration"				"5"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"5 10 25 50 100 200 400"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"heal"				"100"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"duration"			"5"
			}
		}

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_life_stealer.vsndevts"
			"particle"  "particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodbath_eztzhok_burst.vpcf"
			"particle"  "particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodrage_eztzhok_ovr.vpcf"
		}

		// Datadriven
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		"Modifiers"
		{
			// Modifier to handle OrbEffect-Behaviour
			"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven"
			{
				// Will always stay on the caster once the ability is upgraded
				// Hidden
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsBuff"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"

				// OrbEffect-Behaviour
				"Orb"
				{
					"Priority"          "DOTA_ORB_PRIORITY_ABILITY"
					"ProjectileName"    "particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodbath_eztzhok_burst.vpcf"
					"CastAttack"        "1"
				}

				// HealthCost is handled here
				"OnOrbFire"
				{
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_LifeStealer.PreAttack"
						"Target"		"CASTER"
					}
					"SpendMana"
					{
						"Mana" "%AbilityManaCost"
					}
				}

				// Apply the hidden dot modifier to the target here
				// Call IncreaseStackCount to keep stack count on modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter updated
				"OnOrbImpact"
				{
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff"
						"Target"		"TARGET"
					}

					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"IncreaseStackCount"
						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
				}
			}

			// Modifier to show stack count
			// Only visual
			"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsBuff"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				
				"EffectName"		"particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodrage_eztzhok_ovr.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
			}

			// Modifier to handle the dot
			"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsBuff"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				"Duration"			"%duration"

				// Allow multiple instances of this modifier on the target
				// Modifiers stack additivly (dmg) with independent durations
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
		
				
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"HealDamage"
						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/generic_gameplay/generic_lifesteal.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "CASTER"
					}
				}
				
				"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"HealDamage"
						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/generic_gameplay/generic_lifesteal.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "CASTER"
					}
				}

				// Updating visual modifier's stack count
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"DecreaseStackCount"

						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	            "delay"             "3.0 2.75 2.5 2.25 2.0 1.75 1.5"  //The meteor lands on the ground this many seconds after it was cast.
	        }
	        "03"
	        {
	            "var_type"              "FIELD_FLOAT"
	            "source_count"             "1 1 2 2 3 3 4"  //The meteor lands on the ground this many seconds after it was cast.
	        }
	        "04"
	        {
	            "var_type"              "FIELD_FLOAT"
	            "distance"             "500 600 700 800 900 1000 1200"  //The meteor lands on the ground this many seconds after it was cast.
	        }
	        "05"
	        {
	            "var_type"              "FIELD_FLOAT"
	            "slow_percent"             "-10 -12 -14 -16 -18 -20 -25"  //The meteor lands on the ground this many seconds after it was cast.
	        }
		}
	}

		            }

					}
				}
			}
		}

					            "ProvidesVision"    "0"
					            "HasFrontalCone"    "0"
							}

	"boss_true_strike"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"warlock_hellborn_upheaval"

		"AbilitySpecial"
	    {
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"              "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "truestrike_chance"                "30"
	        }
	    }

	    "Modifiers"
	    {

	    	"truestike_activate"
	    	{
	    		"IsHidden"	 "1"
				"Passive"	 "1"
				"Attributes"    "MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
				"OnAttackStart"
				{
					"Random"
					{
   						"Chance" "%truestrike_chance"
   						"OnSuccess"
   						{
   							"ApplyModifier"
							{
								"ModifierName" 	"truestike_modifier"
								"Target" 		"CASTER"
							}
   						}
   						"OnFailure"
   						{}
					}
				}
				"OnAttackLanded"
				{
   					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName" 	"truestike_modifier"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}
				}
			}
			"truestike_modifier"
			{
				"IsHidden"		"1"
				"States"
			    {
			        "MODIFIER_STATE_CANNOT_MISS" "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			    }
			}
	    }
	}

	"boss_carapace"
	{
		// General
	    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	    "BaseClass"             "ability_datadriven"
	    "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE"
	    "AbilityUnitDamageType"         "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
	    "SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
	    "FightRecapLevel"               "1"
	    "AbilityTextureName"			"nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace"

	    // Stats        
	    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	    "AbilityCooldown"               "20"
	    "AbilityCastPoint"              "0"

	    // Cost
	    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	    "AbilityManaCost"               "100"
	    
	    // Special  
	    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	    "AbilitySpecial"
	    {
	        "01"
	        {
	            "var_type"                  "FIELD_FLOAT"
	            "reflect_duration"          "4" // 2.25
	        }
	        "02"
	        {
	            "var_type"                  "FIELD_FLOAT"
	            "stun_duration"             "1" // 0.6 1.2 1.8 2.4
	        }
	        "03"
	        {
	            "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_damage"              "0"
	        }
	        "04"
	        {
	            "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_armor_on_use"               "2500"
	        }
	        "05"
	        {
	            "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "bonus_intellect"               "0"
	        }
	        "06"
	        {
	            "var_type"                  "FIELD_INTEGER"
	            "damage_multplier"               "250"
	        }
	    }
	    
	    // Data driven
	    //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	    "precache"
	    {
	        "particle"                      "particles/generic_gameplay/generic_stunned.vpcf"
	        "particle"                      "particles/units/heroes/hero_nyx_assassin/nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.vpcf"
	        "particle"                      "particles/units/heroes/hero_nyx_assassin/nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace_hit.vpcf"
	    }
	    
	    "OnSpellStart"
	    {
	        "RunScript"
	        {
	            "ScriptFile" 				"lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
	            "Function"                  "spiked_carapace_init"
	        }
	        
	        "ApplyModifier"
	        {
	            "Target"                    "CASTER"
	            "ModifierName"              "modifier_spiked_carapace_buff_datadriven"
	        }
	    }
	    
	    "Modifiers"
	    {
	        "modifier_spiked_carapace_buff_datadriven"
	        {
				"IsBuff"		"1"
				"IsPurgable"	"1"
	        
	            "Duration"              "%reflect_duration"
	            
	            "EffectName"            "particles/units/heroes/hero_nyx_assassin/nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace.vpcf"
	            "Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_PHYSICAL_ARMOR_BONUS"		"%bonus_armor_on_use"
				}
	            "OnTakeDamage"
	            {
	                "RunScript"
	                {
	                    "ScriptFile"    "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
	                    "Function"      "spiked_carapace_reflect"
	                    "DamageTaken"   "%attack_damage"
	                }
	            }
	        }
	        
	        "modifier_spiked_carapaced_stun_datadriven"
	        {
	            "IsDebuff"              "1"
				"IsPurgable"	"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"	"1"
	            "Duration"              "%stun_duration"
	            
	            "OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_DISABLED"
	            
	            "OnCreated"
	            {
	                "AttachEffect"
	                {
	                    "Target"            "TARGET"
	                    "EffectName"        "particles/units/heroes/hero_nyx_assassin/nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace_hit.vpcf"
	                    "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
	                    "ControlPoints"
	                    {
	                        "02"            "%stun_duration %stun_duration %stun_duration"
	                    }
	                }
	            
	                "AttachEffect"
	                {
	                    "Target"            "TARGET"
	                    "EffectName"        "particles/generic_gameplay/generic_stunned.vpcf"
	                    "EffectAttachType"  "follow_overhead"
	                }
	            }
	            
	            "States"
	            {
	                "MODIFIER_STATE_STUNNED"    "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
	            }
	        }
	    }
	}

// Date: 09.02.2015.
	"axe_counter_helix_datadriven"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"             "ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		{
			"soundfile"         "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_axe.vsndevts"

		}

			"MaxLevel"						"7"
			"RequiredLevel"					"7"

			//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

				}

				}

				}
			}


		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_counter_helix_aura_datadriven"
			{
				"Passive"           "1"
				"IsHidden"          "1"

				"Aura_Teams"    "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Aura_Types"    "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_MECHANICAL"
			}

			"modifier_counter_helix_enemy_datadriven"
			{
				"IsHidden"          "1"

				"OnAttackStart"
				{
					"Random"
					{
						"Chance"            "%trigger_chance"
						"PseudoRandom"      "DOTA_PSEUDO_RANDOM_JUGG_CRIT"

						{
							"RunScript"
							{
								"ScriptFile"    "lua_abilities/heroes/axe.lua"
								"Function"      "CounterHelix"
								"helix_modifier"    "modifier_counter_helix_datadriven"
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

			"modifier_counter_helix_datadriven"
			{
				"Duration"      "%cooldown"
				"IsHidden"      "1"

					}
				}

			        {
			        	"ModifierName"	"Disabled_silence"

			        }
				}
			}
		}

	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

							"04" "0 0 0"
						}
					}
				}
			}
			"melee_impact_point"
			{
				"Duration"					"%think_time_extra" // Should work without the added time but appears to have a off by one error so time added so it doesnt destroy itself before occuring
				"ThinkInterval"				"%think_time"
				
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"IsCasterAlive"
					{
						"OnSuccess"
						{
							"Damage"
							{

									"Center"	"TARGET"

									"Radius"	"%impact_radius"

									"Types"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_CREEP | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_MECHANICAL | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_OTHER"
								}
							}

									"00"		"0 0 0"

							}

							}

		//"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.1" 					// Time before spell goes off when cast

					}
				}
			}

				"Duration"					"%think_time_extra" // Should work without the added time but appears to have a off by one error so time added so it doesnt destroy itself before occuring

				}
			}

	"boss_ursa_rage"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PHYSICAL"
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"			"1"
		"MaxLevel"						"1"

		"AbilityTextureName"			"custom/boss_ursa_rage"

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_fury_swipes_caster_lod"
            {
                "Passive"                       "1"
                "IsHidden"                      "1"
                "IsPurgable"                    "0"

                "OnAttackStart"
                // "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"            "lua_abilities/heroes/ursa"
                        "Function"              "fury_swipes_check_stacks"
                    }
                }
                "OnAttackLanded"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"            "lua_abilities/heroes/ursa"
                        "Function"              "fury_swipes_attack"
                    }
                }
            }
            "modifier_fury_swipes_target"
            {
                "IsHidden"                  "0"
                "IsPurgable"                "0"
                "IsDebuff"                  "1"
                
                "EffectName"                "particles/units/heroes/hero_ursa/ursa_fury_swipes_debuff.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"          "follow_overhead"
                
                "OnCreated"
                {
                    "AttachEffect"
                    {
                        "Target"                "TARGET"
                        "EffectName"            "particles/units/heroes/hero_ursa/ursa_fury_swipes.vpcf"
                        "EffectAttachType"      "follow_overhead"
                    }
                }
            }
		}

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"

				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"

			}

			}

	                "Center"   "CASTER"

	"creature_spin_web_vh"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET| DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL"
		"BaseClass" 					"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"broodmother_spin_web"
		
		// Stats
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastRange"				"300"
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"
		"AbilityCooldown"				"15.0"
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"SpawnUnit"
			{
				"UnitName"			"npc_dota_broodmother_web"
				"UnitCount"			"1"
				"SpawnRadius"		"100"
				"Target"			"CASTER"
				"Duration"			"8"
				"OnSpawn"
				{
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_creature_web_effect"
						"Target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
			}
			"CreateThinker"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_creature_spin_web_aura"
				"Target"		"CASTER"
			}
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"		"Hero_Broodmother.SpinWebCast"
				"Target"			"CASTER"
			}
		}
		
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_creature_spin_web_aura"
			{
				"Duration"	"8"
				"Aura"		"web_aura"
				"Aura_Radius"	"%radius"
				
				"Aura_Teams"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_FRIENDLY"
				"Aura_Types"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_ALL"
			}
			"modifier_creature_spin_web_effect"
			{
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect" 
					{
						"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_broodmother/broodmother_web.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
						"Target"			"TARGET"
						"ControlPoints"
						{
							"00" "0 0 0"
							"01" "0 0 0"
							"02" "%radius 1 1"
						}
					}
				}

				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_INVULNERABLE"		    "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_HEALTH_BAR"		    "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_UNSELECTABLE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_FLYING"					"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
			"web_aura"
			{
				"Properties"
				{
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACKSPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT"	"600"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT"		"%health_regen"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE"	"%bonus_movespeed"
				"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ABSOLUTE_NO_DAMAGE_PURE"		"1"
				}
				"States"
				{
				"MODIFIER_STATE_MAGIC_IMMUNE"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
				"OnAttackStart"
				{
					"Random"
					{
   						"Chance" "25"
   						"OnSuccess"
   						{
   							"ApplyModifier"
							{
								"ModifierName" 	"truestike_modifier"
								"Target" 		"CASTER"
							}
   						}
   						"OnFailure"
   						{}
					}
				}
				"OnAttackLanded"
				{
   					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName" 	"truestike_modifier"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName" 	"truestike_modifier"
						"Target" 		"CASTER"
					}
				}
			}
			"truestike_modifier"
			{
				"Duration"		"0.25"
				"IsHidden"		"1"
				"States"
			    {
			        "MODIFIER_STATE_CANNOT_MISS" "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
			    }
			}
		}

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"radius"				"1200"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"count"					"2 4 6 8"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"health_regen"			"100000"
			}
			"04"
			{

				"bonus_movespeed"		"35"
			}
			"05"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"fade_delay"			"2.0 2.0 2.0 2.0"
			}
		}
